content.question: Explain how independent judiciaries strengthen democracy. Describe two actions that an authoritarian regime can take to undermine the independence of the judiciary.

frqParts.text: Explain how independent judiciaries strengthen democracy. Describe two actions that an authoritarian regime can take to undermine the independence of the judiciary.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
